title: 🚨 Rad Bazaar Alert: One Hot Ron’s Bikes Alumax 🚨
content:
🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨

Sometimes, we have to send out an alert when a bike hits the Rad Bazaar, and that time is now!

Igor is selling his 53cm Ron’s Bike Alumax. These frames are made by Frank the Welder and are a modern throwback to rim brake “gravel” bikes of the 90s, featuring a custom steel fork and Paul Racer Medium brakes. Igor built this up with:

  • Velocity Cliffhanger wheelset with 42mm UD tires
  • Campagnolo 9 speed shifters
  • Centaur rear derailleur
  • Ultegra front derailleur.
  • 9 speed Shimano cassette
  • Campagnolo triple crankset, 170mm
  • Campagnolo bottom bracket
  • Cinelli 64 handlebars
  • Nitto stem
  • Moots seatpost
  • Saddle not included (a WTB saddle will be substituted)

 

And is asking $3000 for the complete build. Why is he selling it? He’s got too many bikes. Hit Igor up at the Rad Bazaar.
